humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a tumor size of 4.9 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). There is no indication of direct extension to the chest wall or skin, so it is not a T4 tumor. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 4.9 cm, which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2.0-5.0 cm) according to the TNM staging system for cancer. The report does not mention any invasion of the chest wall or skin, so we can exclude T3 and T4 stages. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
